sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useSocket } from '../contexts/SocketContext' const RescueStatusPage = () => { const [status, setStatus] = useState(null) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) const { socket } = useSocket() // Will be used for real-time updates useEffect(() => { // Mock rescue status - replace with actual API call const mockStatus = { id: 'RES-001', status: 'In Progress', timestamp: new Date(), location: { latitude: -26.2041, longitude: 28.0473, address: 'Johannesburg, South Africa', }, responder: { name: 'Unit Alpha-7', eta: '8 minutes', phone: '+27123456789', }, updates: [ { time: '14:30', message: 'Emergency alert received' }, { time: '14:32', message: 'Unit dispatched' }, { time: '14:35', message: 'Unit en route' }, ], } setTimeout(() => { setStatus(mockStatus) setLoading(false) }, 1000) }, []) if (loading) { return (

Loading rescue status...

) } return (

ðŸš¨ Rescue Status

Emergency ID: {status?.id}

Status: {status?.status}

Help is on the way! Stay calm and remain at your location.

Responder: {status?.responder?.name}

ETA: {status?.responder?.eta}

Contact: {status?.responder?.phone}

Location

{status?.location?.address}

Lat: {status?.location?.latitude}, Lng:{' '} {status?.location?.longitude}

Timeline

{status?.updates?.map((update, index) => (
{update.time} {update.message}
))}
Live Tracking in progress...
) } export default RescueStatusPage
